question: What is the name of your sponsered account? (example: light.starter)
how many credits do you have left in the account?
What was your rating last season? (can be found at battles -> last season)
How many battles have you played? (can be found at battles -> last season)
How many battles have you won? (can be found at battles -> last season)
On Average, how many hours per day have you invested? This can be an estimation based on your feeling.
How many DEC have you earned?
How many SPS have you liquid? (can be found in the SPS dashboard)
How many Alchemy potions do you have on your account?
How many legendary potions do you have on your account?

What is the value of the reward cards you earned?
go to Peakmonsters.com, login, click on bulk view and filter by "owned" and name the **market value** NOT the list price!
